data.name: Primal Dominion
data.detailed_description:
https://discord.gg/zdpsQWV8NP

Built by a small indie-team, Primal Dominion is a Single and Multiplayer Action Adventure Game with Dinosaurs, Gritty Gunplay, Horror and variety of ways to play.

Set in the late 90's and beyond, in a once cutting edge theme park, all has gone wrong as 3 factions fight for Survival, Instinct and Monetary gain.

Take control of a Park Ranger, Mercenary or Ferocious Dinosaur as you battle among various locations on Isla De Baru including industrious labs, remote bases, rural fields, tropical unforgiving forests and a once thriving & populated theme-park.

Features


Robust and Physical Gunplay



Feel your weapons. Each of our weapons are hand tailored to emulate weight, movement, sway and recoil offering you a different experience with each variation.



Dive into an ever expanding inventory of Fire Arms to combat all the dangers that you will experience on your journeys through Isla De Baru.

Our reactive economy is purely based on the players, with each season rarity and quantity is determined purely by player demand.



Customize each of your factions for your preferred game-mode and experience. Each Dinosaur, Ranger and Mercenary will have a broad set of abilities and items you can equip to diversify your missions.



In game performance counts, some unique classes require in-game performance goals to be reached before they can be selected.



Explore using multiple means. We plan to have multiple vehicles introduced to the game by the end of early access.



MODES





Campaign - When not partaking in the PVP experience players can dive into our extensive campaign that will let you explore the wonder and story of Primal Dominion with up to 4 players online or LAN CO-OP.



Extraction - Extraction is a single-life high stakes loot & survive mode. When playing as a Mercenary or Ranger your goal is to find items of use, complete quest issued in your terminal, upload data drives and successfully extract without being eliminated. If you are eliminated you will lose all that you came with. If you extract, you will reap the rewards of your efforts. When playing as a Dinosaur you will be aided by NPC Dinosaurs and Animals, disrupt and stop the humans from extracting at all cost and you will be rewarded with points to upgrade your Creature. As a Dinosaur you will not need to extract, just cause complete chaos and prevent any faction from success.

Team Deathmatch - Go head to head in 3 way arcade styled firefight. Get the most kills and win. This mode is tailored for more relaxed players who enjoy a quicker and lighter experience.

Dinosaur Hunt - A lone dinosaur must kill and convert humans into other Dinosaurs until none remain. Our personal take on Zombies.

data.short_description: Primal Dominion is a Single and Multiplayer Action Adventure Game. Set in the era of the 90's and on. Featuring a fully fledged single-player or co-op campaign and PVP and PVE game modes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3-3220 Intel or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280X or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 4770K Intel or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1080/2060 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent depictions of blood, gore and violence.
